summary: The video discusses individuals who have changed their last names to avoid being associated with their famous family members. It mentions Malia Obama using 'Malia Ann' for her directorial debut at Sundance, Angelina Jolie's birth name being 'Angelina Jolie Voight,' Stephen Gordy's real name being 'Stephen Gordy' while his son uses 'Skylar Gordy,' and Nicolas Cage's real name being 'Nicolas Coppola.' The video highlights how these individuals have adopted different names to maintain privacy or avoid comparisons.
keywords: Nepo babies, Malia Obama, Angelina Jolie, Stephen Gordy, Sky Blue, Nicolas Cage, Sundance Film Festival, directorial debut, last names, famous families, privacy
creator_demographic: Age Range: Unknown, Gender: Unknown, Geographic Location: Unknown
